name: Hire Me lol
description:
This was a super quick prototype for a job app.  

I was trying to explore locomotion opportunities and a vast intense feeling of clawing your way to some home / idea of home. 

Runtime: 1 min

Platform: Oculus Touch

Instructions: Pull trigger to shoot and yank arm, kinda like pulling a lawn mower chain, to propel yourself through space.  Its just ends at the planet sry, this was a quickie! 

Credits

Game Design and Programming: ATL3Y

Music: Rickie Lee Kroell

Person 3D Quill Art: Wesley Allsbrook

Water Shader: Linden Reid
